channel.title: Really need help starting to get mad
channel.description:
i downloaded a source and client and i went into the compiler and run server the jdk is currently C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_22\bin\java.exe i changed it to my 1 which is C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.7.0 and then when i try to compile or launch the server i get this error
'"C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.7.0"' is not recognized as an internal or external command, operable program or batch file. Press any key to continue . . .
and if i add the \bin\java.exe i get this error Error occurred during initialization of VM Could not reserve enough space for object heap Error: Could not create the Java Virtual Machine. Error: A fatal exception has occurred. Program will exit. Press any key to continue . . . can sum 1 pleaseee help me out

item.title: Really need help starting to get mad
item.dc:creator: @tyb97 tyb97
item.description:
@tyb97 wrote:

You have to have,
C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.7.0\bin\javac.exe For you compiler
And then,
C:\Program Files\java\jdk1.7.0\bin\java.exe for your run.
There are also 2 other possible things,

  1. Do you have your environmental variables set?
  2. Is your computer a 64x bit? (if so your path would be
    C:\Program Files(x86)\Java\jdk1.7.0\bin)

Read full topic
item.source: Really need help starting to get mad
